name: European Group of International Accounting Networks and Associations
legal: An informal forum of nineteen of the leading middle-sized accounting networks and associations.
goal: To provide the members with a forum through which to collaborate in order to facilitate an exchange of ideas and information about key international professional developments affecting the accounting and auditing professions in Europe.  This forum, therefore, provides the context and resources for developing common positions on specific issues for submission to key professional stakeholders (e.g. EU, Accountancy Europe, CEAOB, IFAC, accounting standards-setters, national accounting institutes), in order to raise EGIANâ€™s position and influence in key professional developments.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Submissions and representations in relation to the Commission Green Papers and consultations on financial reporting, audit, corporate governance, taxation, company law and SME issues.
